name: Dr. Acula
description:
he ultimate survival game has begun! As a doctor infected by a vampire, you have to suck blood from patients in order to survive and reach the final cure. But you must be careful: other doctors may see the monster you have become, so you must be quick! Your thirst for blood is insatiable, your life is constantly decreasing because of this. 

Suck blood from the patients or collect the precious blood tubes located in hidden rooms across the hospital in order to stay alive, otherwise die from starvation! 

Video game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course.

Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria
